file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 52-18-05-04 - SIDE-HINGED MAIN-DOOR INTERNAL ACTUATING HANDLE - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL SIDE-HINGED MAIN-DOOR INTERNAL ACTUATING HANDLE - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH SIDE-HINGED MAIN DOOR 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the internal actuating handle of the main door. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY AIRCRAFT WITH SIDE- SIDE-HINGED MAIN-DOOR INTERNAL 52-18-05-000-801-A HINGED MAIN DOOR ACTUATING HANDLE - REMOVAL AIRCRAFT WITH SIDE- SIDE-HINGED MAIN-DOOR INTERNAL 52-18-05-400-801-A HINGED MAIN DOOR ACTUATING HANDLE - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 52-18-05 Page 1 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 52-18-05-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH SIDE-HINGED MAIN DOOR 2. SIDE-HINGED MAIN-DOOR INTERNAL ACTUATING HANDLE - REMOVAL A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to remove the internal actuating handle of the side- hinged main door. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM SDS 52-18-00/1 AMM TASK 25-23-04-000-801-A/400 MAIN-DOOR LINING PANEL - REMOVAL C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 811 Side-hinged main door D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially To get access to get the side-hinged main Workstand available door E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Side-hinged main door I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Open the side-hinged main door (AMM SDS 52-18-00/1). (2) Remove the side-hinged main door lining panels ( AMM TASK 25-23-04-000-801-A/ 400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 52-18-05 Page 2 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A CAUTION: MAKE SURE THAT YOU KNOW THE CORRECT INSTALLATION POSITION OF THE HANDLE BEFORE ITS REMOVAL. (1) Remove the nut (19), washer (20), and bolt (21). (2) Remove the actuating handle (22) from its torque tube (ref.). (3) If necessary, disassemble the internal handle as follows: (a) Remove the cotter pin (2), washer (1) and slowly loosen the pin (18) to remove the spring (17) from the internal handle. (b) Remove the nut (10), and bushings (11) and (15) to remove the internal handle stop (5) from the internal handle (13). (c) If applicable, remove the cotter pin (7), washer (8), and pin (3) from the internal handle stop (5). (d) If necessary, remove the bushings (4) and (6) from the internal handle stop (5). (e) If necessary, remove the bushings (14) and (12) from the internal handle (13). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 52-18-05 Page 3 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

WASHER HANDLE DET. B 19. AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH SIDE-HINGED MAIN DOOR Internal Actuating Handle - Removal/Installation Figure 401 - Sheet 2 ZONE 811 A B DET. A FWD 5. INTERNAL HANDLE STOP 6. BUSHING 7. COTTER PIN 4. BUSHING 3. PIN 2. COTTER PIN 8. WASHER 1. WASHER 9. SPRING 10. NUT 11. BUSHING 18. PIN 12. BUSHING 17. SPRING 13. INTERNAL HANDLE 14. BUSHING 16. SCREW 15. BUSHING 145AMM520207.MCE A EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 52-18-05 Page 5 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 52-18-05-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH SIDE-HINGED MAIN DOOR 3. SIDE-HINGED MAIN-DOOR INTERNAL ACTUATING HANDLE - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to install the internal actuating handle of the side- hinged main door. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM SDS 52-18-00/1 AMM TASK 25-23-04-000-801-A/400 MAIN-DOOR LINING PANEL - REMOVAL AMM TASK 52-18-00-820-801-A/500 MAIN-DOOR INTERNAL ACTUATING HANDLE - TEST C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Workstand To get access to the side-hinged main door available E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Side-hinged main door I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Put the internal handle on the shaft of the internal handle. (2) Install the bolt (21), washer (19), and nut (20) to attach the internal handle. (3) If the internal handle was disassembled, assemble it as follows: (a) Put the internal handle stop (5) on the internal handle (13). (b) Install the screw (16), bushings (11) and (15), and nut (10) to attach the internal handle (13) and internal handle stop (5). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 52-18-05 Page 6 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (c) Slowly put the pin (18) in position to install the spring (17). (d) Install the washer (1) and cotter pin (2). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Do an functional check of the side-hinged main door (AMM TASK 52-18-00-820-801-A/ 500). (2) Install the side-hinged main door lining panels ( AMM TASK 25-23-04-000-801-A/400). (3) Close the side-hinged main door (AMM SDS 52-18-00/1). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 52-18-05 Page 7 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
